SEARCH
Package com.gcu.cst339_group5.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.cst339_group5.game.Game
@Table("games") public class Game extends Object
Represents a Game entity in the Video Game Library Catalog.

This class is mapped to the games table in the database using Spring Data JDBC annotations. It includes validation annotations to ensure that user input meets requirements for title, developer, publisher, and release date.
